title: Error 1632 when trying to install.
body:
I can't seem to install League on my laptop. Every time I try I get the error message Server returned unexpected error 1632 attempting to install package C:\Users\MCR0001\AppData\Roaming\Riot Games\League of Legends 3.0.1\install\LoL.NA.msi.

I Have tried a Disc Cleanup, reinstalling DirectX And System Recovery.

 Please Help ME

replies.body:
Hey there,

This error typically shows up when the installer can't access your temp folder, or your temp folder is full. There is some troubleshooting we can do to help with this problem.

First, Make sure you have at least 8 GB of hard drive space available on your computer.

Second, clear the temp folder by following the steps in Microsoft's guide for your version of Windows. [You can find the guide here](http://windows.microsoft.com/en-ca/windows/delete-files-using-disk-cleanup). When you run the Disk Cleanup utility, ensure the following is selected for cleanup:

* Temporary Internet Files
* Offline webpages
* Recycle Bin
* Temporary files
* Thumbnails

Once the cleanup is done, reboot your computer. Try running League of Legends again.
